仲.definition: second month of a season; middle; intermediate; second amongst brothers

仲夏夜之夢.definition: Midsummer night's dream, comedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚[Sha1 shi4 bi3 ya4]

仲尼.definition: courtesy name for Confucius 孔夫子[Kong3 fu1 zi3]

仲巴.definition: Zhongba county, Tibetan: 'Brong pa rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet

仲巴縣.definition: Zhongba county, Tibetan: 'Brong pa rdzong, in Shigatse prefecture, Tibet

仲父.definition: father's younger brother; (sometimes used to refer to Confucius)

仲秋.definition: second month of autumn; 8th month of the lunar calendar
